Scene15SpeakerJacque: ^Jacque: Ah mon bébé, my darling chouchou I am so glad that you are safe.
^Brie: I’m okay papa. Besides, Darwin helped me. You should have seen him with his sword, he was like, “swish,” “en garde,” “take that!”
^Jacque: Oh, ma chouchou, Darwin, he was a very brave. I must tell him merci. I am just so happy zat you are here.
^Nezumi: Jacque, I think you’ll be able to thank Darwin sooner than you think.
^Jacque: Ah, Darwin! Garçon, I cannot tell you merci merci merci enough times for helping to save ma chouchou, I mean my darling Brie. You are to me, how do you say, a hero.
^Darwin: Thank you, sir. I wanted to help.
^Jacque: Ah, oui, words of a hero.
^Brie: Papa’s right, you are a hero Darwin!
^Nezumi: If what I sense is true, then yes Darwin…perhaps not quite yet, but …
^Nezumi: Jacque, Brie, I think it best I speak with Darwin alone now.
